channel.title: Need some help with 562 shops, very easy (cuz i am rsps noob), plz read and rep+

item.title: Need some help with 562 shops, very easy (cuz i am rsps noob), plz read and rep+
item.dc:creator: @ultraking_x2 ultraking x2
item.description:
@ultraking_x2 wrote:

i already succesfully made a ranging shop and a food shop, then i wanted make an armour shop, but this doen’t work! if i trade with the armour shop npc, an interface opens, with the rigth title ‘zarosworld armour shop’ but without any item! i just can’t make it works! there isn’t any compilet error, i never broke 2 times, i didn’t deleted any file and, yes, i placed the rigth npc (873) in the game.

this is scr.com.rs2hd.content.shophandler

case 8: switch (buttonId2) {//armours case 0:return 11335; case 1:return 4087; case 2:return 14479; case 3:return 11732; case 4:return 1187; case 5:return 5698; case 6:return 4587; case 7:return 4151; case 8:return 11730; case 9:return 6524; case 10:return 1052; case 11:return 6568; case 12:return 9101; case 13:return 10720; case 14:return 2414; case 15:return 2412; case 16:return 4514; case 17:return 6111; case 18:return 10344; case 19:return 1478; case 20:return 1704; case 21:return 1725; case 22:return 1727; case 23:return 1729; case 24:return 1059; case 25:return 7671; case 26:return 1495; case 27:return 777; case 28:return 10564; case 29:return 10348; case 30:return 10782; case 31:return 3483; case 32:return 1434; case 33:return 10828; case 34:return 13263; case 35:return 3751; case 36:return 7158;

and this too:

case 8: // Shop Case p.getActionSender().sendString("ZarosWorld armour store. Buy the strongest armours here!", 620, 22); //isGeneral = false; shopopen(p, 8); items = GameEngine.shops.armours; itemsN = GameEngine.shops.armoursN; p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 64209, 93, p.getInventory().getContainer());//Shop Inventory p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 63746, 556, items, itemsN); break;

This is in the folder scr.com.rs2hd.content.shops:

public int[] armours = {11335, 4087, 14479, 11732, 1187, 5698, 4587, 4151, 11730, 6524, 1052, 6568, 9101, 10720, 2414, 2412, 4514, 6111, 10344, 1478, 1704, 1725, 1727, 1729, 1059, 7671, 1495, 777, 10564, 10348, 10782, 3483, 1434, 10828, 13263, 3751, 7158}; public int[] armoursN = {10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 10000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1000};

And this is in the summonpackethandler:

case 873: GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 8); break;

Can any1 help me!

Read full topic
